segments.text: I would like to talk to you , if you have time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to discuss some things about my lease .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What aren ’ t you too sure about ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you tell me when my lease is up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your lease is for three years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I ever decide to leave before the three years , will there be a problem ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you do , I will keep your deductible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you break the contract , then you will not receive your deductible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . I ’ m glad I could clarify things for you .
segments.speaker: S2
